name: Space Engineers 3D Model File
summary: Learn about .MWM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You will most likely only encounter an MWM file if you play Space Engineers and are looking to modify objects in the game. Models can be found in the following directory:
MWM files store appearance information for various types of 3D objects, such as machine guns, angle grinders, automatic rifles, and hand drills.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
